topic.description: The name of the Kafka topic used as dead letter queue
topic.title: Dead Letter Topic Name

oneOf.description: The access key obtained from AWS
oneOf.title: Access Key

oneOf.description: An opaque reference to the aws_access_key

aws_auto_create_bucket.description: Setting the autocreation of the S3 bucket bucketName.
aws_auto_create_bucket.title: Autocreate Bucket

aws_bucket_name_or_arn.description: The S3 Bucket name or ARN
aws_bucket_name_or_arn.title: Bucket Name

aws_delay.description: Milliseconds before the next poll of the selected bucket
aws_delay.title: Delay

aws_ignore_body.description: If it is true, the S3 Object Body will be ignored completely, if it is set to false the S3 Object will be put in the body. Setting this to true, will override any behavior defined by includeBody option.
aws_ignore_body.title: Ignore Body

aws_include_body.description: If it is true, the exchange will be consumed and put into the body and closed. If false the S3Object stream will be put raw into the body and the headers will be set with the S3 object metadata.
aws_include_body.title: Include Body

aws_override_endpoint.description: Set the need for overiding the endpoint URI. This option needs to be used in combination with uriEndpointOverride setting.
aws_override_endpoint.title: Endpoint Overwrite

aws_prefix.description: The AWS S3 bucket prefix to consider while searching
aws_prefix.title: Prefix

aws_region.description: The AWS region to connect to
aws_region.title: AWS Region

oneOf.description: The secret key obtained from AWS
oneOf.title: Secret Key

oneOf.description: An opaque reference to the aws_secret_key

aws_uri_endpoint_override.description: Set the overriding endpoint URI. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option.
aws_uri_endpoint_override.title: Overwrite Endpoint URI

kafka_topic.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names
kafka_topic.title: Topic Names
